user_query: Show me some NLP course from Udacity & SimpliLearn Platform

debug_info.user_query: Show me some NLP course from Udacity & SimpliLearn Platform

original_data.Title: Become a Natural Language Processing Expert
original_data.Short Intro: Master the skills to get computers to understand, process, and manipulate human language. Build models on real data, and get hands-on experience with sentiment analysis, machine translation, and more.
original_data.Prequisites: This program requires experience with Python, statistics, machine learning, and deep learning.
original_data.What you learn: Learn cutting-edge natural language processing techniques to process speech and analyze text. Build probabilistic and deep learning models, such as hidden Markov models and recurrent neural networks, to teach the computer to do tasks such as speech recognition, machine translation, and more!

unified_data.title: Become a Natural Language Processing Expert
unified_data.description: Master the skills to get computers to understand, process, and manipulate human language. Build models on real data, and get hands-on experience with sentiment analysis, machine translation, and more.
prerequisites: This program requires experience with Python, statistics, machine learning, and deep learning
learning_outcomes: Learn cutting-edge natural language processing techniques to process speech and analyze text
Build probabilistic and deep learning models, such as hidden Markov models and recurrent neural networks, to teach the computer to do tasks such as speech recognition, machine translation, and more

original_data.Title: Data Engineering for Data Scientists
original_data.Short Intro: Learn how to wrangle data on a massive scale! By the end of this course, you’ll be able to pull data from a wide range of sources, store it in a database, and create data pipelines (ETL, NLP, machine learning) that power real-world web applications.
original_data.What you learn: For many companies, data scientists who can also tackle data-engineering problems are worth their weight in gold. In this course, you’ll learn how to unlock data silos, pulling data from multiple sources and pipelining it into usable forms for analysts and top-level decision makers. At the end, you’ll even build an impressive machine-learning-powered web application that has real-world, life-saving significance.

original_data.Title: Artificial Intelligence Engineer
original_data.Short Intro: Accelerate your career with this Master's in Artificial Intelligence in conjunction with IBM. This program includes industry-relevant courses, such as Data Science with Python, Machine Learning, Deep Learning, NLP, and Chat GPT and also features hackathons and AMA sessions hosted by IBM. Get job-ready in the AI domain with Capstone projects, practical labs, live sessions, and hands-on projects.
original_data.Course Type: Ranked #1 Masters in Artificial Intelligence Program by Career Karma

unified_data.title: Artificial Intelligence Engineer

unified_data.level: Ranked #1 Masters in Artificial Intelligence Program by Career Karma
prerequisites: Bachelor's degree in a related field (e.g., Computer Science, Engineering, Mathematics)
Understanding of fundamental mathematical concepts (e.g., Linear Algebra, Calculus, Statistics)
unified_data.learning_outcomes: Gain expertise in Data Science, Machine Learning, Deep Learning, and NLP. Develop AI solutions using Python and industry-relevant tools. Participate in hackathons, capstone projects and AMA sessions hosted by IBM.
